email sender (email from)

trans-unit.source: these fields have to be filled out (enter name of formular field seperated by ",")

trans-unit.source: HTML-Template with formular fields in it

trans-unit.target: HTML Version der E-Mail as Attachment zur Plaintext-Version versenden

trans-unit.source: optional: Send a confirmation email to user. Specify the input-field name where the user fills out his/her emailadress:

trans-unit.source: use the value of this submitted form-field as reply-to (optional, name of input field)
trans-unit.target: den Wert dieses ausgefüllten Eingabefeldes als reply-to verwenden (optional, Name des Formularfeldes)

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of rows (records) per page (zero = unlimited) in LIST-view
